snippet: If a right-wing Australian government supported by rural gun owners could successfully implement gun control, America’s government can, too.
abstract: Op-Ed article by former Australian Prime Min John Howard describes actions he took to curb gun violence during his tenure; contends if right-wing Australian government supported by rural gun owners could successfully implement gun control, America can as well.
lead_paragraph: If a right-wing Australian government supported by rural gun owners could successfully implement gun control, America’s government can, too.

headline.print_headline: I Went After Guns. Obama Can, Too.
headline.seo: Australia Banned Assault Weapons. America Can, Too.
headline.main: I Went After Guns. Obama Can, Too.
